pullRequest.title: [WFLY-13559]: Header response has changed and missing fields.
pullRequest.bodyText:
resteasy.providers was overwritten instead of being appended to

nodes.bodyText: This may add a 2nd 'resteasy.providers' ParamValueMetaData to the list, which may work but seems fragile.
